These scrub pants are amazing! I wore them for the first time today. I can’t believe I didn't  try them sooner. Sooo stretchy! 5’0” and 195lbs. I bought Large petite. Great fit for larger hips, thighs, and booty. I have tried a handful or brands and I was pretty loyal to figs for years due to the fit on my short but chunky body. After a little recent weight gain and being between figs sizes in addition to them having zero stretch, I needed to try something else. A coworker suggested these pants for the stretchy material and boy was he so right! I looove them. I might stick with just black for now since that’s the most flattering on me but wow! Amazing scrub pants! 评论概述: PERFECT SCRUBS THAT LAST YEARS - IT IS NAVY
评论详情: I looked EVERYWHERE for specifically Cherokee infinity scrubs because the material is VERY HIGH QUALITY. I suck at laundry and the pair I have from 2019 are still looking brand new. I wanted another set and I’m trying to slowly replace all my scrubs with this specific brand.  This pant is unique because IT HAS DOUBLE SIDE POCKETS which are really important to me for ease at work. The band is great because I’m sick of drawstrings/refuse. This is similar to the joggers but is superior in my option because the pockets.  For someone who is picky about what I will buy and is also economical, this is the best and I already bought a second pair, thinking about the third.  The only thing is on Amazon the picture is not Navy but I trusted that is was marked “NAVY” in the color description - which as you can see is correct. As of 7/2023 the product pic was showing Caribbean Blue.
I have several other pair of these pants and they fit perfectly. I ordered two more pair of the same size and they were ridiculously small! I had to return them. Very disappointed in the sizing.
I bought 1 pair and ended up buying a second, I liked it so much.

I should've listened to the previous reviews. The waist band keeps sliding down. I’m constantly having to pull my pants up so my ass does show, it’s annoying. I didn’t think it would be a big issue when I first got them but after the second wear they just don’t hold up. If the waist band held up these pants would be perfect
